video.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab
video.synopsis: With a little help from a robot and a virtual Thomas Edison, Angie and her pals learn about the wonders of science after finding a hidden laboratory.

episodes.synopsis: To rescue lost hikers, the Lab Kids must build a conventional compass when Nicky's smartphone dies. The club learns about gems to help Nicky's granny.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The club builds a rocket to safely lower an eagle's nest to safety. When JD and Kent need surfboard wax, they find out local honeybees are missing.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A fossil and DNA lesson is in order when Kent finds a dinosaur bone. When Angie's mom's gold bracelet is lost, the Lab Kids build a metal detector.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When a virus turns JD into a donut fiend, can his genius pals find a cure? Robot Von Bolt develops a dangerous malfunction; time to diagnose the bug!
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A "pirate" treasure chest makes Angie, Nicky and Kent suspicious. The geniuses learn about gravity to help ease  panic about a satellite's orbit.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Nicky competes against Sheila in a fashion design show, she clones herself as a model. Kent discovers an Edison super-invention: an exo-bodysuit.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The crew uses science to find out whether a creepy creature called the Whomper is animal or monster. JD's new fertilizer is turning him into a plant!
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Kent's got a case of body odor, and the Lab Kids must remove the stench before he heads to Comic Con. The Kids chase their battle bot through a maze.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Angie's oil slick dissolver creates a hungry Blob monster that runs amok. When the Lab promotes Kent's family's restaurant, it attracts a huge shark.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Genetic science is key to turning the Lab's guinea pig from a monster back to a cute pet. Von Bolt quits the team when he feels under-appreciated.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Lonely Von Bolts wants a robot girlfriend, but a metal love connection is tougher than it seems. Angie and her dog Skeezer accidentally switch bodies.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The club kids shrink to microscopic size to calm Joelle's fears of under-the-bed monsters. Kent borrows the Lab's self-driving car and loses it.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Garbage-eating nanobytes are turning the planet into a giant buffet, and the Kids must stop them. JD and Kent lose their noses in a particle beam.
episodes.title: Episode 13
